item.title: Kill command: still need help :(
item.dc:creator: @ownageownt ownageownt
item.description:
@ownageownt wrote:

Adding commands that doesn’t work is bad, but here is just a basic version. I don’t feel like elaborating, I just wrote a long tut =].

if (command.startsWith("kill")) { client p = server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; p.ApplyDead(); }

Read full topic

item.title: Kill command: still need help :(
item.dc:creator: @Lucas_Shocked Lucas[Shocked]
item.description:
@Lucas_Shocked wrote:

I’m having trouble making a command that can kill someone like ::kill lucas
Well, for one… it doesn’t kill them. It doesn’t do anything. Also, there’s a problem with it. :\

[code] if (command.startsWith(“kill”)) {
{
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(4);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

					if (otherPIndex != -1) {
						client p = server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
						p.sendMessage("You have been killed by a mysterious force.");
						p.animation(077, absY, absX);
						p.animation(453, absY, absX);
						p.pEmote = 2995;
						p.iceBarrage();
						p.updateRequired = true;
						p.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
					}
				} catch (Exception e) {
					sendMessage("Use as ::kill PLAYERNAME");
				}
			}
		}[/code]

It said that there’s something wrong with:

							client p = server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

Can someone post the right way? lol, one that works unlike mine.

Read full topic
